long_description: Whether you use it for commuting, weekend rides or daily workouts, the Marin Larkspur CS3 bike offers a smooth, efficient ride that makes getting from point A to point B more fun and less work. Its overall geometry, adjustable stem and 30mm rise handlebar provide a comfortable upright ride, minimizing body strain and optimizing visibility. 6061 aluminum frame features 4-sided tubing seatstays and chainstays for strength. Shimano EF51 EZ-Fire Plus shifters and Shimano front and rear derailleurs provide responsive shifting through all 24 speeds. Suntour NCX-420 crankset provides 3 gear ranges to get you up and over the hills or let you cruise comfortably over the flats. Forged alloy linear pull brakes with modulation let you ease in the braking power for controlled deceleration. 700c rims and puncture-resistant Vittoria Adventure tires add confidence on long country rides; they're wide as road tires go, boosting stability at slow speeds. Suspension seatpost damps road shock and smooths out your ride. WTB Comfort V saddle is ergonomically contoured and padded for all-day comfort. No special shoes required; platform pedals accommodate a variety of shoe shapes and soles. Specifications on the Marin Larkspur CS3 bike are subject to change. Overstock.
